content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing “automation” research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"] and connection points at positions (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with status NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, a fluid box holding water (amount ≈189.51, temperature 15), connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), and fluid system [63358] (steam output at (-7.5, 24.5)).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with WORKING status, linked to fluid system [63358] and a connection point at (-9.5, 23.5).
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63358 at position(-5.5, 19.5) (status: WORKING)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63357 at position(-2.5, 19.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63370 at position(5.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63369 at position(1.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63365 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63374 at position(0.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63373 at position(1.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63376 at position(1.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63377 at position(4.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY)
  - PipeGroup with fluid_system 63378 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY)

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Ensure both source and target connection points are unobstructed, within range, and share matching fluid system assignments.

• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Confirm that target tiles are unoccupied before placing entities.

• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use correct placement attributes to avoid type errors during position determination.

• Pipe Group Identification & Fluid System Mapping:
  - Verify that pipe groups have fluid system identifiers matching the intended connection, and that they are located within the appropriate search radius.

• Steam Engine Repositioning Failures:
  - Repeated repositioning attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values (62694, 62778, 62860, 62944, 63026, 63110, 63192, and 63276) failed due to no valid candidates being found. Adjust fluid system mapping, candidate selection criteria, and search radius before repositioning.

• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor and promptly replenish boiler fuel to maintain operational status.

• General Connection Strategies:
  - Verify environmental constraints and inventory levels prior to executing repositioning or pipeline attachment actions.
